ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Aeris}
“Our enemy is someone that
could do this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“This Sephiroth guy's
pretty strong, I'd say.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Red XIII}
“It's a power that we should respect…”
